health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Robert Nyiro, Hon. Charles Kitula
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Establishment of a medical scheme for the elderly in the county
health_sector_decisions: Resolution to establish a medical scheme for the elderly in the county, collaboration with NHIF to benefit the elderly
health_evidence_base: Challenges faced by the elderly in accessing affordable medical care, the national government's free medical cover for elderly above 70 years, lack of proper medical scheme or initiative for the elderly in the county
